name: graph-ql
description: Marketplace GraphQL Server in NodeJS, express, and postgraphile.

scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build; NODE_ENV=development node .
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec npm run start-dev
scripts.start-platform: NODE_ENV=platform npm run build; NODE_ENV=platform node .
scripts.platform: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec npm run start-platform
scripts.debug: export DEBUG="postgraphile:postgres"; nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec npm run start-dev
scripts.run:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build; NODE_ENV=production node .
scripts.run:webtesting: NODE_ENV=webtesting npm run build; NODE_ENV=webtesting node .
scripts.deploy:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build; gcloud config set project nobul-rahul; gcloud app deploy app.development.yaml
scripts.deploy:platform: NODE_ENV=platform npm run build; gcloud config set project data-platform-poc-215421; gcloud app deploy app.platform.yaml
scripts.deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build; gcloud config set project nobul-production; gcloud app deploy app.production.yaml
scripts.deploy:webtesting: NODE_ENV=webtesting npm run build; gcloud config set project nobul-web-testing; gcloud app deploy app.webtesting.yaml

author: nobul
